sentences.en: A Korean airliner was hijacked by two passengers and forced to fly to Tashkent.
sentences.cn: 一架韩国的大型客机被两名乘客劫持，被迫飞往塔什干。

sentences.en: A Moroccan fishing vessel and a South Korean cargo ship collided in rough seas.
sentences.cn: 一艘摩洛哥渔船与一艘韩国货船在波涛汹涌的大海上相撞了。

sentences.en: Another aunt — this one elderly and a real lover of palm wine — went on and on about a family friend who married a Korean woman.
sentences.cn: 另一个伯母——这位年岁较大，是一个真正的棕榈酒爱好者——不停地谈论着一位和韩国女人结婚的家族朋友。

sentences.en: As for whether they will touch upon the situation on the Korean Peninsula, we will know after their meetings.
sentences.cn: 至于是否会谈到你所提到的朝鲜半岛局势，这要等他们谈了之后才能知道。

sentences.en: He has translated her latest book into Korean.
sentences.cn: 他把她新出的书译成了韩语.

sentences.en: I'm crazy about Korean TV plays.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢韩国电视剧.

sentences.en: In 1966 the amazing North Korean team made it to the quarter finals.
sentences.cn: 1966年令人瞠目的北朝鲜队挤进了半决赛.

sentences.en: One of the major errors they made was the one that led to the Korean War.
sentences.cn: 他们由此造成的错误之一就是导致朝鲜战争的爆发.

sentences.en: Prices for Korean art have gone through the roof.
sentences.cn: 韩国艺术品的价格飞涨。

sentences.en: Servo was swamped with rush order for the Korean war.
sentences.cn: 塞尔伏为了朝鲜战争的紧急定货单忙得要死.

sentences.en: Servo was swamped with rush orders for the Korean War - perhaps we could help.
sentences.cn: 塞尔伏为了韩战的紧急定货单忙得要死 -- 也许我们可以帮他一点忙.

sentences.en: The departure of the South Korean prime minister was marked with little fanfare.
sentences.cn: 韩国首相悄无声息地离开了。

sentences.en: The Los Angeles riots reflected the bitterness between the black and Korean communities in the city.
sentences.cn: 洛杉矶的暴乱反映出这个城市的黑人社区和韩裔社区之间的仇恨。

sentences.en: The point became grimly evident with the outbreak of the Korean War a few weeks later.
sentences.cn: 几星期以后,由于朝鲜战争的爆发,这种观点无情地显示了自己的正确性.

sentences.en: Then the end of the Korean War produced another spasm of reappraisal.
sentences.cn: 后来,朝鲜战争的结束引起了又一次重新评价的热潮.

sentences.en: They give Korean colleges a bad name.
We both want stability on the Korean Peninsula and in Pakistan.
sentences.cn: 我们都希望朝鲜半岛和巴基斯坦的稳定。

sentences.en: We'll wrap up the Korean stage and head for England.
sentences.cn: 我们准备离开韩国舞台动身去英国.

words.tran_cn: 韩国人的；朝鲜人的；韩国语的；朝鲜语的
韩国人；朝鲜人；韩国语；朝鲜语

trans.tran_cn: 朝鲜的，朝鲜人的，韩国（人）的，韩国（语）的
trans.tran_en: Korean means belonging or relating to North or South Korea, or to their people, language, or culture

trans.tran_cn: 朝鲜人，朝鲜国民，朝鲜语
trans.tran_en: A Korean is a North or South Korean citizen, or a person of North or South Korean origin
